answer: On the Novartis investor relations site (https://www.novartis.com/investors/financial-data/quarterly-results), you can find "2024-q1-transcript", "2024-q2-transcript", "2024-q3-transcript", and "2024-q4-and-full-year-results-transcript" for individual quarterly results and a single "2024 Financial Results" announcement (date Jan 31, 2025).
ground_truth: Novartis 2024年度季度财报系列（Quarterly Financial Results / Financial Data Collection）
